scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix Portfolio_Website"
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run start --prefix backend
scripts.admin: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix AdminPanel"
scripts.all: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix AdminPanel" "npm run dev --prefix Portfolio_Website"
